frame.name: People
frame.definition: <def-root>This frame contains general words for Individuals, i.e. humans. The <fen>Person</fen> is conceived of as independent of other specific individuals with whom they have relationships and independent of their participation in any particular activity. They may have an <fen>Age</fen>, <fen>Descriptor</fen>, <fen>Origin</fen>, <fen>Persistent_characteristic</fen>, or <fen>Ethnicity</fen>. <ex> A <fex name="Person">man</fex> <fex name="Origin">from Phoenix</fex> was shot yesterday.</ex> <ex> She gave birth to a <fex name="Descriptor">screaming</fex> <fex name="Person">baby</fex>yesterday.</ex> <ex> I study <fex name="Age">16-year-old</fex> <fex name="Persistent_characteristic">female</fex> <fex name="Person">adolescents</fex>.</ex> <ex> I am dating an <fex name="Ethnicity">African-American</fex> <fex name="Person">man</fex>.</ex> <ex> She comforted the <fex name="Descriptor">terrified</fex> <fex name="Person">child</fex>.</ex> <ex> I always thought of him as a <fex name="Persistent_characteristic">stupid</fex> <fex name="Person">man</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Origin
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Origin</fen> is the place where the <fen>Person</fen> was born or lived a salient part of her or his life.</def-root>

FE.name: Persistent_characteristic
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Persistent_characteristic</fen> is a physiological characteristic or personality trait of the <fen>Person</fen> which is concieved of as persisting over time.</def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Descriptor</fen> is a temporary condition of the <fen>Person</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Age
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Age</fen> is the length of time the <fen>Person</fen> has been alive.</def-root>

FE.name: Ethnicity
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Ethnicity</fen> is the religious, racial, national, socio-economic or cultural group to which the <fen>Person</fen> belongs.</def-root>

FE.name: Context_of_acquaintance
FE.definition:
<def-root>An expression indicating the context with which the <fen>Person</fen> is associated.
<ex>Hey, where'd that <fex name="coa">museum</fex> <t>guy</t> go?</ex> <ex>Is that the <t>woman</t> <fex name="coa">from the rally</fex>?</ex></def-root>
